dcterms:description: Simulated fluorescence microscopy images of multiple cells, transformed to gray-scale and processed to compute their derivatives using the Sobel kernel. Each gradient image is cropped into non-overlapping patches for analysis.
dcterms:title: Simulated Fluorescence Microscopy Images
